info.name: Trigeminal nerve, sensory root
info.description: The trigeminal cranial nerve has both a motor and sensory root.  The larger sensory root has ophthalmic, maxillary and mandibular divisions that innervate the face and head.
info.item: /Gross/Brain stem & Cerebellum/Brain stem/5 Pons & Medulla-ventral view
/Gross/Brain stem & Cerebellum/Brain stem/7 Pontocerebellar junction-lateral view
